data.name: Ghosts in the Profiles
data.description:
Manya is a mid‑level developer at a small privacy startup. Late one evening she noticed odd behaviour on her workstation: a local archive she trusted became inaccessible and a private sync service that she uses suddenly had a saved credential she didn’t remember creating. You were called in as the incident responder.
What you have

You’ve been given a forensic disk image containing Manya’s Windows user profile. Your job is to investigate the disk file and retrieve the flag. 

Format ISACA{xxxxx}

hints.title: Hint 1
hints.content: If you want to speak like Manya, bring her fox den home.
